channel.title: Comments on: Forward Compatibility, Another Reason for Named Parameters in PHP

item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2013/06/26/forward-compatibility-another-reason-for-named-parameters-in-php/#comment-4074">Shea Bunge</a>.
Thanks, should be fixed now. Had an HTML tag that got mangled.
